00126             function                select_content_line_items( $Start , $Limit , $Field , $Order , $Condition , $Options )
00127             {
00128                   try
00129                   {
00130                         $Category = get_package( 'category::category_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00131 
00132                         if( $Options->get_setting( 'category' , false ) )
00133                         {
00134                               $CategoryNames = $Options->get_setting( 'category' );
00135                         }
00136                         else
00137                         {
00138                               $CategoryNames = $this->Settings->get_package_setting( 'content::content_view' , 'last' , 
00139                                                                         'cf_content_view_conf' , 'content_line_categories' , 'news,article' );
00140                         }
00141                         
00142                         $CategoryIds = $Category->get_category_ids( $CategoryNames );
00143                         $ContentAccess = get_package( 'content::content_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00144                         
00145                         return( 
00146                               $ContentAccess->select( 
00147                                     $Start , $Options->get_setting( 'display_limit' , $Limit ) , $Field , $Order , 
00148                                     "( $Condition ) AND category IN ( ".implode( ' , ' , $CategoryIds ).' )'
00149                               )
00150                         );
00151                   }
00152                   catch( Exception $e )
00153                   {
00154                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00155                   }
00156             }

00176             function                content_archive( $Options )
00177             {
00178                   try
00179                   {
00180                         $CategoryAccess = get_package( 'category::category_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00181                         $CategoryIds = $CategoryAccess->get_category_ids( 
00182                               $Options->get_setting( 'category' , 'news,article,faq,blog_entry' )
00183                         );
00184                         
00185                         $ContentAccess = get_package( 'content::content_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00186                         $PublicationStructure = $ContentAccess->get_publication_structure( $CategoryIds );
00187                         
00188                         /* composing tree structure */
00189                         $Years = array_unique( get_field_ex( $PublicationStructure , 'publication_year' ) );
00190                         foreach( $Years as $y )
00191                         {
00192                               $YearTemplate = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'archive_year.tpl' );
00193                               $YearTemplate = str_replace( '{publication_year}' , $y , $YearTemplate );
00194 
00195                               if( $this->Security->get_gp( 'year' , 'integer' , date( 'Y' ) ) == $y )
00196                               {
00197                                     $Months = array_unique( 
00198                                           get_field_ex( 
00199                                                 array_filter( 
00200                                                       $PublicationStructure , 
00201                                                       create_function( "\$d" , "return( \$d->publication_year == $y );" )
00202                                                 ) , 
00203                                                 'publication_month'
00204                                           )
00205                                     );
00206                                     foreach( $Months as $m )
00207                                     {
00208                                           $MonthTemplate = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'archive_month.tpl' );
00209                                           
00210                                           $MonthTemplate = $this->String->print_record( 
00211                                                 $MonthTemplate , 
00212                                                 array_filter( 
00213                                                       $PublicationStructure , 
00214                                                       create_function( 
00215                                                             "\$d" , "return( \$d->publication_year == $y && \$d->publication_month == $m );"
00216                                                       )
00217                                                 )
00218                                           );
00219                                           
00220                                           if( $this->Security->get_gp( 'month' , 'integer' , date( 'm' ) ) == $m )
00221                                           {
00222                                                 $Content = $ContentAccess->get_content_for_date( $y , $m , $CategoryIds );
00223                                                 
00224                                                 foreach( $Content as $c )
00225                                                 {
00226                                                       $ContentTemplate = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( 
00227                                                             __FILE__ , 'archive_content.tpl'
00228                                                       );
00229                                                       $ContentTemplate = $this->String->print_record( $ContentTemplate , $c );
00230                                                       $MonthTemplate = str_replace( 
00231                                                             '{content_data}' , $ContentTemplate.'{content_data}' , $MonthTemplate
00232                                                             );
00233                                                 }
00234                                           }
00235                                           $MonthTemplate = str_replace( '{content_data}' , '' , $MonthTemplate );
00236                                           $YearTemplate = str_replace( 
00237                                                 '{month_data}' , $MonthTemplate.'{month_data}' , $YearTemplate
00238                                           );
00239                                     }
00240                               }
00241                               
00242                               $YearTemplate = str_replace( '{month_data}' , '' , $YearTemplate );
00243                               
00244                               $this->Output .= $YearTemplate;
00245                         }
00246                   }
00247                   catch( Exception $e )
00248                   {
00249                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00250                   }
00251             }

00271             function                view_content( $Options )
00272             {
00273                   try
00274                   {
00275                         $id = $this->Security->get_gp( 'content_id' , 'integer' , false );
00276                         if( $id === false )
00277                         {
00278                               $this->Output = '{lang:exact_content_was_not_found}';
00279                               return;
00280                         }
00281                         $Content = $this->ContentAlgorithms->get_by_id( $id );
00282                         
00283                         $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'content_view_template.tpl' );
00284                         
00285                         $this->Output = $this->String->print_record( $Template , $Content );
00286                         
00287                         $this->PageComposer->set_page_title( get_field( $Content , 'title' ) );
00288                         $this->PageComposer->add_page_keywords( get_field( $Content , 'keywords' ) );
00289                         $this->PageComposer->add_page_description( get_field( $Content , 'description' ) );
00290                   }
00291                   catch( Exception $e )
00292                   {
00293                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00294                   }
00295             }

00319             function                view( $Options )
00320             {
00321                   try
00322                   {
00323                         $ContextSet = get_package_object( 'gui::context_set' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00324                         
00325                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcxs_content_line' );
00326                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcxs_content_view' );
00327                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcxs_content_archive' );
00328 
00329                         $ContextSet->execute( $Options , $this , __FILE__ );
00330                         
00331                         return( $this->Output );
00332                   }
00333                   catch( Exception $e )
00334                   {
00335                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00336                   }
00337             }
00338       }
